additional.info1: - Development View does not need to be localized
additional.info2: - You can freely add features to the DevOption class

message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IN_DELETEING:
It is being deleted. 
Do not disconnect the USB cable.
message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IN_SYNCING:
Synchronizing with the remote control. 
Do not disconnect the USB cable.
message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_SYNC_DONE:
Synchronized. 
Unplug the USB cable to exit the app and use the remote control.
message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IN_COPYING:
Copying is in progress. 
Do not disconnect the USB cable.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_NOT_CONNECT_WITH_HUIS: Connect to HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER with a USB cable and tap the "Connect with a computer" button on the screen.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_DISCONNECT_WITH_HUIS: The connection with the HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER has been disconnected. To continue editing, connect to HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER with a USB cable and tap the "Connect with a computer" button on the screen.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_DISCONNECT_WITH_HUIS_: The connection with the HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER has been disconnected. The information being edited will be discarded. To edit again, connect to HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER with a USB cable and tap the "Connect with a computer" button on the screen.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_END_GARAGE_IN_S:
If you quit the app during sync, your data may be corrupted. 
 Do you really want to finish?
message.STR_DIALOG_INIT_SYNC_WITH_HUIS_ERROR:
Synchronization failed. 
HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER may not be connected to your computer. 
 After connecting to your computer with a USB cable, tap the "Connect to computer" button on the HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER screen.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_WARN_NONSAVE:
The remote control changes have not been saved. 
Please save. 
 If you select "Do not save", your changes will be lost.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_WARN_OVERLAP:
Editing cannot be completed because some buttons are placed on top of each other. 
Please relocate the button.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_WARN_OVERLAP_EXPORT:
Cannot export because some buttons are placed on top of each other. 
Please relocate the button.
message.STR_DIALOG_WARN_OVERLAP_MESSAGE_DETAIL_I: There is a button that overlaps with.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_WARN_MULTIPLE_BLUETOO:
Editing cannot be completed because one is set. 
 Only one Bluetooth device can be set with the custom remote control. Edit the 
 button to reduce the number of Bluetooth devices set to one or less.

Cannot be exported because one is set. 
 Only one Bluetooth device can be set with the custom remote control. Edit the 
 button to reduce the number of Bluetooth devices set to one or less.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_LIMIT_1:
Unable to create remote control. 
The remote control that can be registered in HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_LIMIT_2:
Up to pieces. 
Delete unnecessary remote controls.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_DELETE_REMOTE:
If you delete the remote control, it cannot be restored. 
Are you sure you want to delete it?
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_NO_REMOTE_NAME:
Editing cannot be completed because there is no remote control name. 
Please enter your name.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ALERT_NO_REMOTE_NAME_:
Cannot export because there is no remote control name. 
Please enter your name.
message.STR_DAIALOG_ERROR_MESSAGE_LOAD_NON_SUPPO:
Failed to load the image. 
 This is an unsupported file format. 
Select a JPEG or PNG file.
message.STR_DAIALOG_ERROR_MESSAGE_LOAD_JPEG2000_:
Failed to load the image. 
JPEG2000, JPEG Lossless are not supported. 
Select a JPEG or PNG file.
message.STR_DAIALOG_ERROR_MESSAGE_LOAD_BROKEN_FI:
Failed to load the image. 
The file may be corrupted. 
Please check the file and try again.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ERROR_NO_REMOTE_IN_HU:
I cannot create a new remote control. 
Please register the remote controller with HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER first.
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_IMAGE_FILE_TOO_LARGE_1:
Failed to load the image. 
The image size is too large.
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_IMAGE_FILE_TOO_LARGE_2: Select an image of M bytes or less.
message.STR_DAIALOG_ALERT_DELTE_PAGE:
Once a page is deleted, it cannot be restored. 
Are you sure you want to delete it?
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_HUIS_VERSION_IS_OLD_1: The app cannot be used because the version of HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER is old.
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_HUIS_VERSION_IS_OLD_2: Download the update file from and version HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_GARAGE_VERSION_IS_OLD_1: The app cannot be used because the version of HUIS UI Creator is old.
message.STR_DIALOG_ERROR_GARAGE_VERSION_IS_OLD_2: Download the update file from and version HUIS UI Creator
message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IN_IMPORTING:
Importing. 
Do not disconnect the USB cable.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IMPORT_AFTER:
For the buttons on the imported remote controller, the device at the time of export is registered. 
Please change the signal settings of the button before actually using it.
message.STR_GARAGE_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IMPORT_REMOTE_:
The remote control file may be corrupted. 
Please check the file and try again.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IMPORT_AFTER_AC: The air conditioner button cannot be used as it is. Delete the button once and place the registered air conditioner button.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_IMPORT_AFTER_BT: The Bluetooth button cannot be used as it is. Change the button settings to change the signal settings of the registered Bluetooth remote controller.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_ERROR_HUIS_VERSION_IS:
This application cannot be used with the connected HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER. 
Please update to the firmware compatible with this application.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_STORAGE_LOCKED: Storage access to the HUIS-100RC is blocked. Do you want to release it?
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_SUCCEEDED_STORAGE_UNL:
Unblock storage access to the HUIS-100RC. 
Unplug the USB cable, then reconnect it to launch the app.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_FAILED_STORAGE_UNLOCK: Failed to unblock storage access to HUIS-100RC. please try again.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_SYNC_DETAIL_PROPERTY:
The settings are being applied. 
Do not disconnect the USB cable.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_SCREENSAVER_CHANGED_C: The image of the favorite standby screen has been changed.
message.STR_DIALOG_MESSAGE_SCREENSAVER_CHANGE_CA:
The changes on the favorite standby screen have not been saved. 
Please save. 
 If you select "Do not save", your changes will be lost.

input.STR_DIALOG_PROPERTY_INPUT_CHECK_DISABLE_: Hide left / right move button in header

property.STR_EDIT_PROPERTY_ABOUT_MACRO_TEXT: This function allows you to send multiple types of signals in succession.

splash.STR_SPLASH_MESSAGE:
Synchronizing with HUIS REMOTE CONTROLLER.
Do not disconnect the USB cable.

toast.STR_TOAST_CANT_EDIT: Can't edit. Use right click to see options.
